title: Ep. 694 Did You Miss What Trump Did Last Week?
description:
Summary:
In this episode I address Trump’s bold move on sanctions last week and why it should reassure you. I also discuss Twitter and Facebook’s ongoing war on conservatives and why they believe they’ll win. Finally, I discuss an economic mystery that’s befuddling “experts.” 
 
News Picks:
Facebook is targeting Trump supporters again, and the reasons they gave are ridiculous. 
 
Is Ted Cruz being targeted by Twitter?
 
President Trump has targeted 7 Russian billionaires, and regular listeners of the show will “remember the names.” 
 
This mental health counselor tweeted that he was “excited” about the fire in Trump Tower.
 
Who conducted a cyber-attack on Iran?
 
Why is the Twitter’s CEO tweeting an anti-GOP article?
 
A terrific piece about persistently low inflation. 
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.

Summary: In this episode I address Trump’s bold move on sanctions last week and why it should reassure you. I also discuss Twitter and Facebook’s ongoing war on conservatives and why they believe they’ll win. Finally, I discuss an economic mystery that’s befuddling “experts.”    News Picks: Facebook is targeting Trump supporters again, and the reasons they gave are ridiculous.    Is Ted Cruz being targeted by Twitter?   President Trump has targeted 7 Russian billionaires, and regular listeners of the show will “remember the names.”    This mental health counselor tweeted that he was “excited” about the fire in Trump Tower.   Who conducted a cyber-attack on Iran?   Why is the Twitter’s CEO tweeting an anti-GOP article?   A terrific piece about persistently low inflation.    Copyright CRTV.
